title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4033.1 - Time for weighing out
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4033.1 - Time for weighing out

State Regulations

Every jockey must be weighed for a specified horse not
less than 30 minutes before the time fixed for the race, and the number of the
horse shall be exhibited officially as soon as possible. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4033.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
